<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_sohd3_dotmail.dotmailDisplayFilter</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>dotmailDisplayFilter</name><script><![CDATA[var dotmailDisplayFilter = Class.create();

dotmailDisplayFilter.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {

        function dotmailDisplayFilter() {

            if (gs.hasRole("admin")) {
                answer = "true";
            } else {
                answer = "false";
            }

            return answer;
        }
    },

    type: 'dotmailDisplayFilter'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>moody_admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-30 00:05:01</sys_created_on><sys_id>7e0f15f41b81dd904261edb1604bcb97</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>dotmailDisplayFilter</sys_name><sys_package display_value="DOTMail" source="x_sohd3_dotmail">f953a5641b79b8107fd2cbfa234bcb32</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="DOTMail">f953a5641b79b8107fd2cbfa234bcb32</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_7e0f15f41b81dd904261edb1604bcb97</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>moody_admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-08-03 18:58:22</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
